com.simbachain.simba

Interface Metadata

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppMetadata

    public interface Metadata
    Metadata about an application. This contains info about the contract including methods, name and the type of network. Depending on the network type, the functions to Fund, getBalance, and be able to auto credit accounts may or may not be available.

    • Method Summary

      The api name of the contract, used in the URL.

      The string that indicates a parameter is a file or file hash.

    • Method Detail

      • getApiName

        java.lang.String getApiName()
        The api name of the contract, used in the URL.
        Returns:
        the contract API name

      • getFaucet

        java.lang.String getFaucet()
        The URL to the faucet of the network if it's a test network with a faucet.
        Returns:
        the faucet URL or null.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        The name of the contract. May be the same as the api name.
        Returns:
        the name of the contract.

      • getNetwork

        java.lang.String getNetwork()
        Get the name of the network instance.
        Returns:
        the name of the network instance.

      • getNetworkType

        java.lang.String getNetworkType()
        Get the network type.
        Returns:
        the network type.

      • isPoa

        boolean isPoa()
        Is the nework Proof of Authority
        Returns:
        true if the network is proof of authority.

      • isSimbaFaucet

        boolean isSimbaFaucet()
        Is simba in control of the faucet.
        Returns:
        true if simba is in control of the faucet.

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        The contract type. One of scaas, simbachain.com or platform
        Returns:
        the type of contract.

      • getMethod

        Method getMethod(java.lang.String name)
        Get a method object by name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the method.
        Returns:
        the method object with the given name.

      • getFileIndicator

        java.lang.String getFileIndicator()
        The string that indicates a parameter is a file or file hash.
        Returns:
        string representing a fie or file hash value.
